decisions.decision: Optimize Claude Code configuration - Create CLAUDE.md and consolidate documentation
decisions.rationale: Improve session initialization speed, reduce context size, enhance prompt caching effectiveness
decisions.expected_impact: 80% faster sessions, 90% cost reduction, better consistency

decisions.decision: Use TSH NeuroLink exclusively for ALL notifications and communications
decisions.rationale: Unified system for team chat, customer-sales, consumer support, and system notifications. Eliminates need for Twilio and Firebase.
Comprehensive security for multi-role system with complex access patterns. Ensures wholesale clients only see their data, salespeople only see assigned customers.

decisions.decision: TDS Core orchestrates ALL Zoho operations
decisions.rationale: Centralized sync control, rate limit management, error handling, monitoring. Prevents direct API access chaos.
alternatives_considered: Direct Zoho API calls from services

decisions.decision: Phase 1: Read-only sync from Zoho Books + Zoho Inventory
decisions.rationale: Build confidence in TSH ERP data accuracy before allowing writes. Parallel operation reduces risk.
decisions.outcome: In progress - products and stock synced successfully
